name: Cumbuca
description:
An online multiplayer card game that is highly dependent on luck.

So you will need friends to play this ... at least the build for the jam you will lolol

start a game, copy the url and send to your friends

rules are simple: 

1. if your card is on table you earn money on end turn

2. if your card is on table, you can replace it by a better one

3. if another player's card is on table, use yours to remove it (if same color or same number, removes, if higher number replaces)

4. every action makes the whell of fortune roll, whenever the color of the wheel matches the color of the table cards, the owner gets to duplicate their money

5. first to reach 1k wins the battle
